resources.string: MT-Eink-Launcher

Elderly mode (unstable), after opening, it will have a better experience on mobile e-mail books such as reading in pocket, increase and bold font display, shield unnecessary APP desktop icons (mainly enhance the experience of students / elderly users), and prompt to set PIN code after opening. When closed, you need to enter PIN code to verify your identity.
Offline mode (unstable). When enabled, some useless networking functions will be turned off.

Hide the bottom bar in the desktop. After hiding, you can enter the desktop settings through the desktop icon or the \"hour\" section of the clock. This feature is not recommended to be used with the preset wallpaper in \"Desktop wallpaper\" or with \"Show the wallpaper of current settings\", because you will not be able to switch between the wallpaper interface and the APP interface.
After some functions are set, you need to restart the desktop (or restart the device).
< | Back

Network permissions, which need to be used in \"Weather\" and \"check updates\". When BUG appears on the desktop, it will return error messages. There is an offline mode in the desktop, and some networking functions can be turned off (the complete offline mode will be updated later).
To access the network connection manager, you can mainly query the currently connected network (used to check whether the WIFI is currently connected)
Access to the WIFI connection manager is required. You can mainly query the WIFI of the current connection (used to check whether the WIFI is currently connected)
Apply for permission to change WIFI (deprecation status)
Local access for downloading updates and setting icons
Apply for permission to restart APP (when you click \"reload\", instead of quitting APP but restarting APP)
Boot broadcast permission for \"boot self-boot\" (temporarily deprecated function)
Set the permission to read wallpaper
Global pop-up dialog box permissions (originally used for the floating ball function, but now temporarily deprecated)

SD card read permission (some versions of Android local storage permission and SD card read permission are separated, in case some devices have SD card, it is very embarrassing, so you need to add permission to adapt, also download update function and set icon function)

Apply for the permission to install apk (it is not well adapted, so it is also temporarily abandoned. How to install updates has been given a pop-up window prompt in the desktop, which is very convenient for QWQ)
Get device IMEI, get device unique identifier
Top Text
Desktop List
Desktop Wallpaper
Text Size
Hide application management
About \"MT Launcher\"
Restart \"MT Launcher\"
UnInstall \"MT Launcher\"
